goal.title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

indicators.title: Percentage of students who receive scholarships or aid for low-income students with respect to the total number of students enrolled UPO
Percentage of UPO's annual budget dedicated to scholarships and social assistance for low-income students with respect to the total annual UPO budget

goal.title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

indicators.title: Percentage of own dining room scholarships granted with respect to those requested
Percentage of cafeterias on campus that offer a menu with local and seasonal products and also have fair trade products over the total number of said establishments

goal.title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

indicators.title: Percentage of people from the university community who use the sports facilities and/or enrol in physical activities offered by the university
Percentage of UPO's annual budget allocated to the area of Health and Occupational Risk Prevention and Healthy Campus and Sports
Students attended in the mental health service

goal.title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

indicators.title: Number of students enrolled in undergraduate and postgraduate courses at UPO
Number of students enrolling for the first time in a degree and postgraduate course at UPO
Number of students completing their undergraduate and postgraduate studies
Degree of satisfaction of the students with teaching
Student rate over number of Full time teachers
Teaching Saturation Index (percentage of credits allocated to a teacher with respect to the total possible)
Teaching Saturation Index (percentage of credits allocated to a teacher with respect to the total possible)
Academic Success rate Master and Degree
Academic Performance Rate
Abandonment rate
Number of people using the SADF service (annual)
Number of students with functional diversity who finish their graduate and postgraduate studies at the UPO
PDI and PAS participating in training for attention to diversity
Percentage of university population that participates in programs/activities that promote education for sustainable development
Number of students enrolled in specific master for sustainable development, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights and gender equality

goal.title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

indicators.title: Percentage of women enrolled over total students
Percentage of female new students out of all new students
Percentage of women participating in research and innovation projects
Percentage of PDI women out of the total PDI of the UPO
Percentage of PAS women out of the total PAS of the UPO
Percentage of UPO's annual budget allocated to the Equality area
Percentage of people in the university that participates in training and awareness-raising activities on equality
Number of interventions in application of the protocol against sexual and gender-based harassment at the UPO
Number of people (PDI+PAS) that welcomes conciliation plans
Percentage of women members of collegiate bodies and management teams of with respect to the total number of members
Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
Percentage of female professors with respect to the total number of professorships

goal.title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

indicators.title: Average water consumption (m3) per person from the university community per year
Water footprint of the UPO
Percentage of UPO's annual budget for the sustainable management of water and sanitation in university facilities and the care of aquatic ecosystems

goal.title: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

indicators.title: Percentage of electricity consumed that comes from renewable sources with respect to total consumption
Percentage of RITE buildings/facilities with an A, B or C energy efficiency certificate.
Energy consumption per enrolled student and staff (PAS/PDI/contractors)

goal.title: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

indicators.title: Number of students with curricular and extracurricular internships managed by the UPO
Number of students who have been assisted by the professional guidance service or who have participated in the entrepreneurship and employability activities of the FPO
Employment rate of graduated students after one year
Percentage of UPO personnel with a permanent employment contract or civil servants
Accident and incident rate per capita for all UPO personnel
Number of people participating in training activities related to risk prevention and occupational safety

goal.title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

indicators.title: Number of spinoffs created in the UPO
Percentage of the UPO's annual budget dedicated to research and development (R&D)
Percentage of Income from R&D derived of external funds over the total budget of the university allocated to R&D
Percentage of Income from R&D derived of public funds over the total budget of the university allocated to R&D
Percentage of Income from R&D derived of private funds over the total budget of the university allocated to R&D
Number of patents or exploitation licenses linked to research carried out at the UPO

goal.title: Reduce inequality within and among countries

indicators.title: Percentage of staff with functional diversity with respect to the total staff of the UPO
Percentage of students with functional diversity with respect to the total number of students
Percentage of facilities and services certified as universal accessibility
Number of older people participants in the program 'Open Classroom for Seniors”
Number of Third Sector entities with which the UPO has signed collaboration agreements for the promotion of University Volunteering
Number of people participating in activities of Volunteering through the UPO Volunteering Office

goal.title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

indicators.title: Percentage of parking places for bicycles out of total of members of the university community
Percentage of trips of the university community that is carried out by means of sustainable transport
Percentage occupancy of the Flora Tristán residence
People who participate in the 'Shared Accommodation' program
Percentage of campus surface university occupied by green areas and gardens

goal.title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

indicators.title: Kg/year/person of food waste in the UPO facilities
Kg of Hazardous Waste generated in laboratories and UPO workshops throughout a year
Kg of Electrical and Electronics Waste generated per year per capita on campus
Kg of plastic waste generated per year per capita on the UPO campus
Kg of paper used per capita recovered in selective bins on the UPO campus
Kg of glass used per capita recovered in selective bins on the UPO campus
Percentage of tenders in which they have integrated ethical, social and environmental clauses (beyond the law)

goal.title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

indicators.title: Carbon footprint. Direct and indirect emissions. Scope 1, 2 and 3
Number of people participating in climate change related activities
Number of investigations on climate change
Academic offer in Climate Change

goal.title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

indicators.title: Number of investigations on conservation of oceans, seas, lakes, rivers and marine resources
Academic/training offer in aquatic ecosystems from a perspective of conservation and sustainable use of their resources

goal.title: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

indicators.title: Biodiversity index in campus (existing and reintroduced)
Number of publications on conservation and management of soils and terrestrial ecosystems
Academic/training offer on conservation and sustainable uses of terrestrial ecosystems

goal.title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

indicators.title: Transparency index and accountability at UPO
Community involvement in decision-making
Percentage of cases resolved with respect to those reported to the university ombudsman

goal.title: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

indicators.title: Percentage of the annual budget of the UPO for projects and actions of International Cooperation for Development from both own and external funds
Percentage of people who participate in international cooperation and development activities with respect to the total university community
Percentage of people in the university who participate in mobility programs
